```{r setup}
library(pwb)
```

```{r, single GS}
  ad <- curtailment::singlearmDesign(nmin=50,
                                   nmax=140,
                                   C=20,
                                   minstop=40,
                                   p0=0.5,
                                   p1=0.6,
                                   alpha=0.1,
                                   power=0.8,
                                   minthetaE=1,
                                   maxthetaF=0,
                                   max.combns=1e3)
  bounds <- curtailment::drawDiagram(ad)$bounds.mat
  single.GS <- pwbGS(theta=0.5, des=ad, bounds=bounds)
  single.GS$ests[, 1:5]
  round(single.GS$mc.error, 5)
```
